title: The actis and deidis of the illuster and vailzeand campioun, Schir William Wallace, knicht of Ellerslie
author: Henry, the Minstrel, fl. 1470-1492.
publisher: Be Robert Lekpreuik at the expensis of Henrie Charteris, [and] ar to be sauld in his buith, or the north syde of ye gait abone [sic] the Throne,
notes: By Henry the Minstrel. Purportedly based on a Latin prose original by John Blair, of which no copy is known.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
